extendedInfo.description: Largest religion Quiz for free! Download the Christianity Quiz in no time and see how well you know the largest religion in the world! Do you know what another name for the substance known as chrism is? If yes it means you already got some points! Reach the highest score and invite your friends to try to beat your score! -  Choose the mode you like: 10 Questions, 25 Questions, 50 Questions or 5 Errors Endless!- Choose an answer from A, B, C or D!- Think fast and answer correctly to get higher rankings!- Get Scandalous Score Booster by answering the question worth more than 2000 points!- If you choose 5 Errors Endless Mode your game will last until you give 5 incorrect answers!- You can share your score and achievements with your friends on Facebook!Christianity is the largest religion in the world, with a little over 2 billion members. It is significantly larger than the second largest: Islam. About one third of the world's population currently identifies themselves as Christian.Christianity is the largest in the U.S. and Canada, with profoundly deep influences on American and Canadian culture and politics. The sacred text is the Bible. Christians believe in Jesus Christ and follow his teachings. They believe Jesus is Godâs own son, sent by God to become human. In particular, conservative Christians provide the main opposition to freer abortion access; equal rights for gays and  lesbians, bisexuals and transsexuals, including the right for same-sex couples to marry etc. Countries with the largest number of Christians are the U.S., Brazil, Mexico and Russia. It appears that there are thousands of Christian churches. There seems to be a church on every other street corner in city after city.Some studies say that Brazil has twice as many Roman Catholics as Italy, while Nigeria has double the number of Protestants as Germany, where the Protestant Reformation began. About 50% of persons who identify themselves as Christians are Roman Catholics.Many people regard their own denomination or faith group within their own religion to possess the totality of religious truth; they view other denominations as teaching at least some error. Other people go further, and consider others to be in serious error and sometimes to be in opposition to the truth. Within fundamentalist and other evangelical Christianity denominations, others are sometimes referred to as being led by Satan or some of his demons.According to the membership, second place takes Islam but third is Hinduism. Persons with no formal, organized religion include Agnostics, Atheists, Deists etc. Their numbers are growing in Europe, North America, and other places. With the collapse of Communism in the USSR, the total numbers worldwide dropped precipitously and are now increasing.  There is no consensus on the number of Buddhists in the worlds.  There is no consensus on the data of founding of Judaism as well. Some claim that Adam and Eve were the first Jews, and lived circa 4000 BCE; others suggest that they and all biblical persons prior to King David are mythical; they never existed. Some would place the date at the time of Abraham, circa 1900 BCE. Many, perhaps most, followers of Chinese folk religion follow a number of different philosophies including Taoism. The number cited for Taoism is an estimate of the number of individuals who follow only Taoism.Ads information:=============This app is free and ad supported. When you install it, you may get shortcut icons on your background which lead to more free and sponsored apps. If you like, you can remove them anytime without further consequences. You may also get certain notifications about new apps, but if you don't want to receive them either, you can chose to opt out at http://www.airpush.com/optout and http://opt.leadbolt.com/ or you can do it directly from the icon.

reviews.comment: This app would be GREAT if it didn\'t pervasively blitzkreig your alerts with STUPID ADS.  REALLY???  It\'s annoying enough that they have annoying \"Wanna make a fast $100?\"  during the quiz.
reviews.author: Laura Harter

reviews.title: Excwllent app
reviews.comment: This app teaches me very well. I don\'t look at the bad side I look at thw good aide.
reviews.author: Toreen Dangleben

reviews.title: Its not worth giving out my information for
reviews.comment: Love the game but this game gives out your information to people. Plus, information of your family and friends you have on your device. So I deleted it.
reviews.author: Pennylou Beebe

reviews.title: Good ap but....
reviews.comment: Fin game and gets you thinking. But I feel like i hve had to sell my soul to play it.  It loaded junk on my nook, has an ad after every round, and regu-arly naviates away from the game to th internet and to google play.  I can take ads in a feww game, but this is excessive.
reviews.author: theresa moore

reviews.title: Middle ground for ethics.
reviews.comment: The questions are good but the ads are evil...someone who claims Christ should never give up cleanliness for money...I can see promoting other good games (by good I mean clean Christian) but not straight out of Hell games that push magic and violence with a sex appeal that any teenager boy would be tempted with....the ads are of the devil. ....I also don\'t like the putting short cuts to things I don\'t want or need like to slots for example...Christians don\'t gamble or at least they shouldn\'t
reviews.author: Kat Pup

reviews.title: Very fun & informative.
reviews.comment: Throws in some Catholic based questions every now & then that make no sense to a person not raised that way. Overall it is great!!!
reviews.author: Matthew Gray

reviews.comment: Love it. Good way to study.
reviews.author: Marjorie Ferguson

reviews.title: Too much ads
reviews.comment: The questions are not bad but the ads are very annoying and the content of ads promote evil games.
reviews.author: David Mantay

reviews.title: Helpfull
reviews.comment: It is a good way to memorise bible verses. Also improve my knowledge of the bible
reviews.author: Daqelesi Basudra

reviews.title: Don\'t even think about getting this
reviews.comment: loaded unauthorized apps. Do not get this app
